item.title: Report X-2025031192
item.description:
Report X-2025031192

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-26T21:14:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-13
  • City: DETROIT
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING FOOD. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2025030740
item.description:
Report X-2025030740

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-10
  • City: YPSILANTI
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DRIVER CALLS IN A LEAKING PACKAGE. DRIVER DID NOT TOUCH SECURED VEHICLE AND CALLED CENTER. REPONDER ARRIVES WITH FULL PPE AND DECISION TREE IN HAND. RESPONDS TO THE SPILL ACCORDING TO THE DT AND RESPONSE SHEET. SPILL CONTAINED AND BROUGHT BACK TO THE CENTER FOR PROCESSING.
